body_html:
Unfortunately I installed PyTorch 0.4 by Conda and this error occurred on my Ubuntu 14.04.
bin/python': free(): invalid pointer: 0x000000000216dd40 ***
Everything was fine until I put some code which works for managing the folder where I save metrics of my DL model (Seems had no relation with PyTorch, weird).

body:
Unfortunately I installed PyTorch 0.4 by Conda and this error occurred on my Ubuntu 14.04.
bin/python': free(): invalid pointer: 0x000000000216dd40 ***
Everything was fine until I put some code which works for managing the folder where I save metrics of my DL model (Seems had no relation with PyTorch, weird).
